```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
load('sfn_datapaper_data.RData')
```

## R Markdown

```{r tabRef, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE, results="asis"}

knitr::kable(sfn_sitespecies, caption = "Table caption here...", booktabs = TRUE)
flextable::flextable(sp_genus_all)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
sfn_sitesmap
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
